import React, { useState } from "react"; import "./reset.css"; import "./style.css"; // Import the CSS file import { Switch, Select, MenuItem, TextField } from "@mui/material"; function App() { const initialState = { darkMode: false, dynamicBackground: false, fontSize: "Small", temperatureUnit: false, currentLocation: "A", updateFrequency: "1 Hour", weatherAlerts: false, notifyTraining: false, dailyForecast: "Morning", }; const [settings, setSettings] = useState(initialState); const handleToggle = (settingKey) => { setSettings((prev) => ({ ...prev, [settingKey]: !prev[settingKey], })); }; const handleSelectChange = (event, settingKey) => { setSettings((prev) => ({ ...prev, [settingKey]: event.target.value, })); }; return (
